original_text: Moreover they that were nigh them, even unto Issachar and Zebulun and Naphtali, brought bread on asses, and on camels, and on mules, and on oxen, and meat, meal, cakes of figs, and bunches of raisins, and wine, and oil, and oxen, and sheep abundantly: for there was joy in Israel.
korean_text: 또 그들의 근처에 있는 자로부터 잇사갈과 스불론과 납달리까지도 나귀와 낙타와 노새와 소에다 음식을 많이 실어왔으니 곧 밀가루 과자와 무화과 과자와 건포도와 포도주와 기름이요 소와 양도 많이 가져왔으니 이는 이스라엘 가운데에 기쁨이 있음이었더라

sentences.original_text: Moreover they that were nigh them
even unto Issachar and Zebulun and Naphtali
and on camels, and on mules, and on oxen
and meat, meal, cakes of figs
and bunches of raisins, and wine, and oil
for there was joy in Israel
